definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Whether Apple actually wants to compete with Acer and Asus is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 苹果是否真的想要与宏基和华硕竞争是另一回事。

sentences.english: What’s that? Asus did it already?
sentences.chinese: 华硕已经着手这么做了。

sentences.english: He believes the company's PC contract manufacturing business is overvalued.
sentences.chinese: 哈里哈兰认为华硕的个人电脑合同制造业务被高估。

sentences.english: I've never heard such stories when he tells.
sentences.chinese: 干露露从未听过象龙之谷讲华硕这样腾讯故事。

sentences.english: I consider the Asus Motherboard to be the best in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我认为华硕主机板是最好的地区之一。

sentences.english: I would like to ask, I support those parts of the motherboard.
sentences.chinese: 我认为华硕主机板是最好的地区之一。

sentences.english: The computer company told me that my notebook computer needed one week to repair.
sentences.chinese: 华硕电脑公司给我的反馈是维修需要至少一周时间。

sentences.english: ASUS ranked with a score of 416.
sentences.chinese: 华硕在这项评比中的得分是416分。

sentences.english: X16. As a example of similar solution can serve Asus XG station.
sentences.chinese: 为解决类似的例子可以成为华硕星光站。

sentences.english: We'll be taking a look at a pair of high-end X38 boards from ASUS and Gigabyte.
sentences.chinese: 我们将看一看来自华硕和技嘉的一双高结束X38板。
华硕呼吁其设计的超薄。

sentences.english: I've never heard such stories because he tells.
sentences.chinese: 干露露从未听过象龙之谷讲华硕这样腾讯故事。
